TopAxisLayout Class

Defined in: input/charts/TopAxisLayout.js:1
Module: charts

Contains algorithms for rendering a top axis.

(

)
protected

Defined in input/charts/TopAxisLayout.js:305

Returns the transformOrigin to use for an axis label based on the position of the axis and the rotation of the label.
